The @B_android#content#ContentProviderOperation#Builder_E@ is first created by calling @B_android#content#ContentProviderOperation#newInsert_E@, @B_android#content#ContentProviderOperation#newUpdate_E@, @B_android#content#ContentProviderOperation#newDelete_E@ or @B_android#content#ContentProviderOperation#newAssertQuery_E@.
